prompt_update: You will receive a text. Your task is to create a new original text by taking inspiration from this text. Just output your new text, nothing else. Here is the text:
initial_story:
The Eurovision Song Contest is just around the corner and this year, it's taking place in Malmo, Sweden.

You can find out all about the event right here.

The UK's entry for 2024 is Olly Alexander who'll be performing his song, Dizzy.

But how's he feeling ahead of the big night, where he'll perform in front of 200 million people!

De-Graft sat down with him to find out all about his preparation for the competition.

The Eurovision Song contest Grand Final will be shown on BBC One and iPlayer on Saturday 11 May.
stories:
Amidst the excitement and anticipation, the Eurovision Song Contest is set to illuminate Malmo, Sweden. To keep you updated, here's a peek into the proceedings.

Olly Alexander, the vibrant and talented representative from the United Kingdom, is all geared up for this year's competition. His entry, "Dizzy," promises to captivate audiences worldwide.

As we delve into his preparations, we caught up with him for an exclusive interview. Stay tuned as Olly shares his emotions, training regimen, and expectations ahead of the grand night.

Mark your calendars! The Eurovision Song Contest Grand Final will be broadcasted on BBC One and iPlayer on Saturday, 11 May 2024. Get ready for a night filled with music, culture, and camaraderie!

As we go behind the scenes, we've secured an exclusive interview with her. Tune in as Lea shares her feelings, rehearsal routine, and aspirations leading up to the magnificent night.
